svg.text: Decrease technical debt, rethink main concepts

svg.text: Compiler + tooling → fearless change, velocity, risk taking

text.style: font-family: SF Pro Display; font-size: 35px; filter: url(#shadow2);

svg.text: Language and standard library has richer feature set

text.style: font-family: SF Pro Display; font-size: 35px; filter: url(#shadow2);

svg.text: Development feels longer, but then it just wörks

text.style: font-family: SF Pro Display; font-size: 35px; filter: url(#shadow2);

svg.text: No SEGFAULT infrastructure, high prototype quality

text.style: font-family: SF Pro Display; font-size: 35px; filter: url(#shadow2);

svg.text: Focus on domain and real problems, not optimization

text.style: font-family: SF Pro Display; font-size: 35px; filter: url(#shadow2);

svg.text: To infinity and beyond: GUI, Web, Embedded, ...
